</MethodEndpoint>



获取币种详情

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"coin","in":"query","description":"币种，多个币种用,隔开","required":false,"style":"form","explode":true,"allowReserved":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"OK","content":{"*/*":{"schema":{"title":"CommonResponse«List«CoinDetailVO»»","type":"object","properties":{"error":{"title":"ErrorMessage","type":"object","properties":{"args":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object"}},"code":{"type":"string"},"msg":{"type":"string"}}},"msgInfo":{"type":"string"},"result":{"type":"array","items":{"title":"CoinDetailVO","type":"object","properties":{"actualPrecision":{"type":"integer","description":"实际精度","format":"int32"},"coin":{"type":"string","description":"币种"},"displayPrecision":{"type":"integer","description":"显示精度","format":"int32"},"spotCoin":{"type":"string","description":"现货币种"}}}},"returnCode":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"}}}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"},"403":{"description":"Forbidden"},"404":{"description":"Not Found"}}}
>
